snippet.title: VR Skater - Official Pro Skaters Trailer | Perp Games VR Summer Showcase 2023
snippet.description: Watch the latest trailer for VR Skater to hear from pro skaters about their experiences playing the upcoming game. VR Skater will be available on PlayStation VR2 on July 21, 2023.
